Soldiers make up the bulk of hobgoblin society, whether that society is a village or a military unit. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Hobgoblin Soldier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3053) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 198 1.1 **Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6 **Str** +3 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** -1 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (10 arrows), [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6) --- **AC** 18 (20 with shield raised) **Fort** +5 **Ref** +6 **Will** +5 **HP** 20 **Formation** When they're adjacent to at least two other allies, the hobgoblin soldier gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 to Reflex saves against area effects.
